tool_description: mbar offers a free, read only REST API for access to its programme data, including event, artist and club series information
name: mbar
title: mbar

api_list.name: Event
api_list.description: Can be ordered by start time, descending; and various fields can be filtered

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: the name of the event

optional_parameters.name: club
optional_parameters.description: the id of the club series the event belongs to.

optional_parameters.name: club__name
optional_parameters.description: the name of the club series the event belongs to.

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description: the event's start time, in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM[:ss[.uuuuuu]] format.

optional_parameters.name: end_time
optional_parameters.description: the event's end time, in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM[:ss[.uuuuuu]] format.

optional_parameters.name: time_modified
optional_parameters.description: the timestamp of the last modification, in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM[:ss[.uuuuuu]] format.

optional_parameters.name: datefilter
optional_parameters.description: ongoing — ongoing events, next — next events, including any ongoing ones., upcoming — upcoming events, excluding any ongoing ones.today — all events happening today (day changes at 4 in the morning).tomorrow — all events happening tomorrow (day changes at 4 in the morning).

api_list.name: Club Series

optional_parameters.name: resource_uri
optional_parameters.description: the URI of this club series resource.

optional_parameters.name: resource_webpage_uri
optional_parameters.description: the URI of this club series webpage on mbar's site.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: the club series' name.

optional_parameters.name: lead
optional_parameters.description: club series description lead.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: club series description body.

optional_parameters.name: picture_uri
optional_parameters.description: club series picture URI.

optional_parameters.name: picture_caption
optional_parameters.description: club series picture caption.

optional_parameters.name: hosts
optional_parameters.description: a list of objects representing the artists hosts hosting this club series, each with the following fields: full_name — the artist's name, with affiliation. resource_uri — the URI of the artist resource.

optional_parameters.name: events
optional_parameters.description: a list of objects representing the events in this club series, each with the following fields: name — the name of the event. start_time — event start time and date in ISO 8601 format, Helsinki local time. end_time — event end time and date in ISO 8601 format, Helsinki local time. resource_uri — the URI of the event resource.

optional_parameters.name: extrainfo_urls
optional_parameters.description: a list of objects representing URLs pointing to extra info about the club series, each with the following fields: address — URL address. description — URL description. type — URL type (Facebook, homepage, ...)

optional_parameters.name: time_modified
optional_parameters.description: the timestamp of the last modification.

api_list.name: Artist

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: the name of the artist.

optional_parameters.name: time_modified
optional_parameters.description: the timestamp of the last modification, in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM[:ss[.uuuuuu]] format.

optional_parameters.name: extra_info
optional_parameters.description: extra info such as artist affiliation or country of origin.
